name: Toast Boast
description:
This game is controller compatable! Connect your Xbox controllers and pretend that we're triple A!

Toast Boast is a competitive 2 player beverage toasting simulator where you and a friend fight to be the first one to toast the other so hard that their glass shatters, thus wishing them good health. You cant toast on an empty glass, so grab some beverage from the tap!

CONTROLLS

Controllers:

Left stick (LS) to move, A to Toast

Keyboard:

P1 - WASD to move, Space to Toast

P2 - Arrow Keys to move, Enter to Toast

Fun stuffs made by these nerds:

Michael Arcadi

Jesse Baker
